category: Member sport group regulations/Article 22 (Appointment of officers)
contents: Article 22 (Appointment of Executives) ① The vice president and directors of member sports organizations are appointed at the general meeting from among those recommended by the president. However, the appointment authority may be delegated to the chairman by resolution of the general meeting, and in this case, the appointment results must be reported at the next general meeting. Revised on March 23, 2017. ② The period of authority to appoint officers delegated pursuant to Paragraph 1 shall be limited to immediately before the first board of directors meeting after the delegation, except in cases specifically determined by the general meeting. Newly established on March 23, 2017, August 7, 2017, and October 6, 2021. ③ The composition of executives must meet the following requirements. Revised on March 23, 2017, August 7, 2017, July 24, 2019, October 6, 1, 2021. Graduates and current employees of the same university cannot exceed 40% of the registered officers. 2. Former national team players must account for more than 20% of the registered executives. However, for sports that do not have a national representative, former athletes will replace them, and organizations that have not merged with the affiliated sports organizations of the (former) Korean Sports Association among the existing national sports federations of the (former) National Lifestyle Sports Association are an exception. 3. Deleted 2022. 12. 26. 4. Deleted 2022. 12. 26. 5. Efforts should be made to ensure that the ratio of specific genders does not exceed 70%. ④ If a person who is qualified as a representative pursuant to Article 7, Paragraph 6 becomes an executive of a member organization, the number of directors (including the chairman and vice-chairman) cannot exceed 20%, and in this case, only one executive can be from one organization. may be appointed. Revised on April 28, 2016, March 23, 2017. ⑤ When there is a vacancy in the position of vice president and director, the board of directors shall elect a person recommended by the chairman by-election, and this shall be reported to the next general meeting. ⑥ The auditor shall be appointed at the general meeting, and one administrative auditor shall be appointed from among the delegates under Article 7, Paragraph 1, and one accounting auditor shall be appointed as a certified public accountant. Revised 2018. 4. 25., 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 12. 26. ⑦ Among member sports organizations, the president of a regular or associate member organization must prepare the required documents and receive approval from the Sports Council. Revised 2016. 4. 28., 2017. 3. 23., 2018. 4. 25., 2021. 10. 6. ⑧ Deleted 2018. 4. 25. ⑨ After inauguration, an executive of a member sports organization shall be subject to Article 26 If a reason arises or is revealed, approval will be revoked, dismissal, or dismissal. Newly established on April 25, 2018. ⑩ Member sports organizations must register and manage the results of the appointment of executives in the Sports Association Sports Information System. Newly established 2022. 12. 26. [Title revised 2021. 10. 6.]
